DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect medicine type 2 diabetes lipid control . This study require 6 office visit lab test examination . All study relate medicine medical examination provide cost subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : A clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus . Women must pregnant breastfeeding study 30 day study . Must sign inform consent form study clinic . Exclusion criterion : Severe chronic disease would prevent participate complete study investigator 's judgement . Use investigational drug within 30 day 5 half life first dose study medication . Insulin use > 1 week past 3 month .
